root.name: 11eyes CrossOver
root.description: Overview 11eyes Crossover was released on Xbox 360 in Japan on April 2nd, 2009. Xbox 360 InstallationGame installation on the Xbox 360 takes up to 4.8GB of hard drive space. It is unknown whether or not game installation benefits the game's performance or load times. Official SiteThe official site for 11eyes CrossOver can be viewed on 5pb here.
